CardValidator - Class in <Unnamed>
This class creates instances of the CreditCard class And provides methods to validate the card using the Luhn Algorithm Date 10/16/13

CreditCardDriver - Class in <Unnamed>
This class creates a GUI and utilizes the methods of the CardValidator class to receive credit card information, determine whether the card is valid and print a report of all valid cards entered.

Default constructor
